reviews.content: Went there for a finger problem, and specifically asked the receptionist if the doctor there was qualified to look at fingernail problems and was told yes. .    After a long wait, was seen by an ancient doctor who told me he had no idea what was wrong with me, but still charged for the visit..    Two days later was called by a phone staff to see how I was and when I expressed my dissatisfaction he told me to go into the office and talk to them, which I did and I was then told by the office manager Rhonda that the doctor saw me and the charges were  justified - when I called back to let the calller know what happened, I was put on hold/disconnected, and then when I called back again and asked for the name of the main office , I was told not to call and the police would be notified - an hour later Belleview PD Showed up at my place of employment - what ever happened to integrity - not at this place! STAY AWAY!!!!
